name: Rune of Terror
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Construct Modifications/Rune-Carved/Rune of Terror

sections.body: This rune is triggered the first time a creature moves adjacent to the modified construct. The rune creates 20-foot-radius spread of necromantic energy. Creatures in the area must succeed on a DC 20 Will saving throw or become panicked for 1d4 rounds. If the Will save succeeds, the creature is shaken for 1 round.
